data.title: Rolo Tomassi Where Myth Becomes Memory - Black Lemonade Galaxy Vinyl UK 2-LP vinyl set
data.meta_description: ROLO TOMASSI Where Myth Becomes Memory (Limited edition 2022 UK 10-track double LP, with gatefold picture sleeve and printed inners, pressed on Black Lemonade Galaxy vinyl. Sixth album from the UK metal band.
